entry.title: Lynch - Raspberry Slush Syrup - 2 x 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 44.99

Beat the heat with a cool slushy or granita made from this Drink Syrup!

Guests will start craving your colorful slushies as soon as they see them at your carnival cart or concession stand. Keep up with the demand for these refreshing treats with this  slushy Syrup! With the large amount of servings per container, your venue will be in good supply. Simply pair it with a compatible pump for fast, efficient service.

Use Ideas

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

Awesome Flavor

Great flavors at a great value, and this flavor enhances the appearance, color, and taste of your icy cold drinks. The colors and flavors are sure to boost impulse sales.

Great for Slushies, Snow Cones

Just a small amount of these Syrups will help you make a large number of profitable drinks! You can even begin offering light and sweet granitas to put a new spin on your coffee shop or cafe's drink menu.

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A refreshing slush drink base full of flavour. The cool taste appeals to adults, teens and kids alike!

USE IDEAS

Designed to make slush, but can also be used as snow cone syrup.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Add 500 mL to each 6 L of prepared Neutral Slush. Pour into slush machine and serve. For individual servings, add 30 mL (1 fl oz) of slush syrup per 350 mL (12 fl oz) prepared Neutral Slush.

INGREDIENTS

Water, glucose-fructose, citric acid, artificial flavour, sodium benzoate, colour, xanthan gum, mono & diglycerides (soya).

Yield 104 L
Serving Size 175 ML
Servings 594
Lynch - Blue Raspberry Slush Syrup - 4 L

entry.title: Lynch - Neutral Slush Base Syrup - 2 x 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 34.99

Beat the heat with a cool slushy or granita made from this Drink Syrup!

Guests will start craving your colorful slushies as soon as they see them at your carnival cart or concession stand. Keep up with the demand for these refreshing treats with this  slushy Syrup! With the large amount of servings per container, your venue will be in good supply. Simply pair it with a compatible pump for fast, efficient service.

Use Ideas

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

Awesome Flavor

Great flavors at a great value, and this flavor enhances the appearance, color, and taste of your icy cold drinks. The colors and flavors are sure to boost impulse sales.

Great for Slushies, Snow Cones

Just a small amount of these Syrups will help you make a large number of profitable drinks! You can even begin offering light and sweet granitas to put a new spin on your coffee shop or cafe's drink menu.

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Neutral flavour slush designed as a base for Lynch flavour concentrates.

USE IDEAS

Designed to make slush, but can also be used as snow cone syrup.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Dilute 1 part Lynch Neutral slush base concentrate with 5 parts of cold water. Add your favoruite Lynch Slush Flavour (500mL of slush syrup flavour to each 6L of prepared Neutral Slush). Add to slush machine and serve.

INGREDIENTS

 Sugar, water, sodium benzoate, citric acid, sodium citrate, caramel, xanthan gum, mono- and diglycerides (soya).

Yield 48 L
Serving Size 175 ML
Servings 274
Lynch - Slush Mix Base Neutral - 2 x 4 L

USE IDEAS

Designed to make slush, but can also be used as snow cone syrup.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Dilute 1 part Lynch Neutral slush base concentrate with 5 parts of cold water. Add your favoruite Lynch Slush Flavour (500mL of slush syrup flavour to each 6L of prepared Neutral Slush). Add to slush machine and serve.

INGREDIENTS

 Sugar, water, sodium benzoate, citric acid, sodium citrate, caramel, xanthan gum, mono- and diglycerides (soya).

Yield 48 L
Serving Size 175 ML
Servings 274
Lynch - Neutral Slush Base Syrup - 4 L

entry.title: Fresh Plus - Watermelon Drink Crystals - 450g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.99 - 38.99 (2 variants)

Fresh Plus - Watermelon Drink Mix Crystals - 450g

Beat the heat with a cool slushy or granita made from this Drink Crystals!

Guests will start craving your colorful slushies as soon as they see them at your carnival cart or concession stand. Keep up with the demand for these refreshing treats with this  slushy Crystals! With the large amount of servings per container, your venue will be in good supply. Simply pair it with a compatible pump for fast, efficient service.

Use Ideas

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

Awesome Flavor

Great flavors at a great value, and this flavor enhances the appearance, color, and taste of your icy cold drinks. The colors and flavors are sure to boost impulse sales.

Great for Slushies, Snow Cones

Just a small amount of these Crystals will help you make a large number of profitable drinks! You can even begin offering light and sweet granitas to put a new spin on your coffee shop or cafe's drink menu.

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Lynch Fresh Plus Drink Crystals are packed with authentic fruit taste.

USE IDEAS

Great as a drink crystal and is also ideal as a slush.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

DRINK: Add contents of package (450 g) to 4.5 L (160 fl oz) of cold water. Mix until dissolved. Chill. Stir before serving. SLUSH: Mix 2 pouches (900 g) of flavour crystals with 4 L (140 fl oz) cold water and put into machine. Rinse container using 2L (70 fl oz) of cold water and pour into machine. A total of 6L (210 fl oz) cold water is used. Products take approximately 1 hour to become a slushie.

INGREDIENTS

Sugar, citric and/or malic acid and/or sodium citrate, natural and/or artificial flavour, ascorbic acid (vitamin c - 270mg/100g), colour, tricalcium phosphate and/or silicon dioxide, may contain cellulose and/or arabic gum.
